about_the_game:
You can now travel the world in Virtual Reality. MyWay VR aggregates 360° and VR videos into a single digital platform, detecting a geographical location of where the content was filmed. The app offers a virtual journey through different countries, continents and cultures. You can visit Canada, Russia, France, South Africa, Thailand, Japan and many more. The videos are public and regularly updated and categorized. There are around 50 selected high quality videos right now. All the clips can be downloaded, streamed, paused, rewind, or added to a playlist.
Contact us if you want to place a video360 from your region in MyWay VR!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD 290 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR

short_description: A 360 degree video player that enables you to watch videos from all over the world. It detects geographical location of the video, so you can choose the place you want to visit.
